posts.post_content:
Well, after just getting KILLED on my T206 "Set 2" consignment to H&S (I mean 25%+ loss), I was about to throw in the towel and selling everything I own that even resembled a baseball card.

But, I decided to jump back on the horse that just kicked my teeth out, and do some upgrading on my main set.  Nice to say, really not to many.  Below is a list of upgrades.  I collect raw, but am an attuned slab cracker.

Commons (vg)

Batch
Birmingham
Casey
Davidson
Dougherty, portrait
Durham
Freeman
Konetchy, up
Magee, portrait
Moran, Prov.
Shaw, StL
Stone
[STRIKE]Stoval, bat[/STRIKE] :) Thanks Bill
White, portrait
Williams
Wiltse, pitch
Zimmermann

Southern Lg. (g/vg)

Fritz
Otey
Thebo

HOF (g/vg)

Huggins, mouth
Keeler, portrait
Tinker, knees
Waddell, portrait

Any help would be appreciated:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

I also have 50+ cards (mostly graded) for trade.

Thanks, Scott
